name: ts-morph-structures
description: Structure classes for ts-morph, including type structure classes.

debug: Debugging this code requires Node 18.  Node 20 will fail to start running your code when using --inspect-brk and --import.
note to self: what about --inspect-wait, added in Node 20.15?  No, that doesn't fix it.
tsimp: tsimp is currently showing tsc errors in stage_2_snapshot:jasmine, which bizarrely aren't breaking the build.  Deal with this another day.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run tsc-buildsystem && node --expose-gc ./node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js
scripts.debug: npm run clean && npm run tsc-buildsystem && node --inspect-brk --expose-gc ./node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js
scripts.tasks: npm run clean && npm run tsc-buildsystem && gulp --tasks
scripts.build-stage-one: npm run clean && npm run tsc-buildsystem && node --expose-gc ./node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js stage_one
scripts.build-stage-two: npm run clean && npm run tsc-buildsystem && node --expose-gc ./node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js stage_two
scripts.build-stage-three: npm run clean && npm run tsc-buildsystem && node --expose-gc ./node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js stage_three
scripts.use-cases: npm run clean && npm run tsc-buildsystem && node --expose-gc ./node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js use-cases
scripts.debug-stage-one: npm run clean && npm run tsc-buildsystem && node --inspect-brk --expose-gc ./node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js stage_one
scripts.debug-stage-two: npm run clean && npm run tsc-buildsystem && node --inspect-brk --expose-gc ./node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js stage_two
scripts.debug-stage-three: npm run clean && npm run tsc-buildsystem && node --inspect-brk --expose-gc ./node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js stage_three
scripts.debug-use-cases: npm run clean && npm run tsc-buildsystem && node --inspect-brk --expose-gc ./node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js use-cases
scripts.is-repo-clean: npm run clean && npm run tsc-buildsystem && node ./gulp-utilities/assertRepoIsClean.js

author: Alexander J. Vincent <ajvincent@gmail.com>
